title: "Hey J4, cya!" -Enemy Riven
body:
I am 5/0 vs the enemy Riven (6/1 total cuz i went 1 for 1 during a gank) and suddenly my client crashes as I am 4 man ganked in the middle of my great escape  and have been trying to re-connect for 6 minutes now

This smells fishy

replies.body: moral of the story? all riven players are pieces of shit
I can confirm this with my last riven teammate.

I used to be a Riven player. I stopped because I was a piece of shit.

So I can kind of confirm.
I thought you took an arrow to the knee.

Taking an arrow to the knee would probably force me to amputate my leg, but I'd keep playing the same after that.

If I can't think of something funny to respond with I say something serious.
At least you aren't making cringy bad jokes :D
That's because none came to mind. I love bad jokes and make them whenever I can think of them.
I also love bad jokes. I approve.
Well now I wouldn't go that far... I love to play Riven and I don't play into the stereotypes that Riven players normally have...

They're kidding, to an extent I'm sure. Don't worry about it if you aren't actually a douchebag. I personally feel all Katarina and LB players are jackasses, but I know that not everybody who plays them is actually a jackass. 

Don't worry about it.
either way, not sure why he got downvoted to oblivion
Because he ruined the joke lol. Obviously all Riven players aren't pieces of shit...
{{champion:23}}  players on the other hand...
Right? Almost as bad as {{champion:238}} players...

> [{quoted}](name=Nucleophilic atk,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MfAnzsY4,comment-id=0001000100000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-04-11T12:00:38.555+0000)
>
> Right? Almost as bad as {{champion:238}} players...

Rivens and Vaynes are the worst,everyone else can't compete.
{{champion:122}} players are some of the most toxic assholes I have ever encountered in League. Sorry but it's the truth.
So true. Anything that caused them to die is "OP".
Anything that _can_ kill a good zed is damn strong lol, they're slippery as fuck.

{{champion:127}} Hi.
 {{champion:35}} Hello.
{{champion:45}} 'Sup.
Veigar could obliterate Zed before... now after his E change, Zed is like a counterpick to Veigar

Zed ult has a .75 second delay.
Vieg stun has a .5 second delay.

Vieger may not be able to lane against him anymore. But ulting a good vieger is suicide, since you know exactly where Zed will be when he reappears.

Yeah but {{champion:45}} doesn't have to do that {{item:3157}} 
It's more of affecting Veigar's offensive, not defensive. If Veigar tries to manipulate Zed into the edge of his cage, Zed just shadows out and jumps on veigar, and can ult Veigar, since his stun is already down, unless Vei has zhonyas

>Your condition was that they had to kill him, not necessarily beat him.

I've already said Vieg can't really lane against him anymore.

Liss and Veigar ults are pretty strong, but Zed still beats Veigar.

Shaco... not even close. In urf, maybe, but anywhere else, no.
The most whiney player I met was actually an enemy gragas. He kept trying to tell me that Anivia  was so OP and needed to be nerfed...

> [{quoted}](name=Elias1724,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MfAnzsY4,comment-id=00010001000000010000,timestamp=2015-04-10T23:51:58.920+0000)
>
> Zed players might not be toxic but they are the most whiny when they die or happen to get outplayed.
> 
> {{champion:238}} OMG Ahri is so OP with her charm. I don't get why riot hasn't nerfed it yet!

Well he's not wrong,trashfox is a pretty retarded champion,really does need nerfs.

"Ahri charm breaks dashes cause clearly ahri,with all her immense mobility,needs it most"
{{champion:268}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ariel the Cruel,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MfAnzsY4,comment-id=0001000100000001000000020000,timestamp=2015-04-11T15:20:55.450+0000)
>
> {{champion:268}}

That one's pretty funny too.

"We realized immobile mages have issues vs assassins,as even outside of the issues laning against them they can't follow their roam effciently and can't push down turrets as fast,so we created a mage who can defend himself against their mobility and has a steroid to take down towers too...........................
and then we gave him mobility on top of that"

genius.

He's also a skill match-up for Zed, despite lacking reliable CC.

It's hilarious watching Zed's rage when they can't simply Face-roll their lane opponent. Never mind when they get stomped.

--------------------------

Of course. Then Zed just goes to bot lane, face rolls a double kill, and snowballs uncontrollably from there.
Darius is just a toxic kinda guy. They captured his whole ethos perfectly with Dunkmaster. One of the best skin concepts I have seen.

The old days of the Darius syndrome... 
Darius taking all the kills with his ult and thus starving his team and causing him to lose (well it wouldn't be as bad anymore because assist streaks is a thing now)

i remember yesterday i met a darius main who started raging because he lost to a shen 
"Wtf, did they buff him or something? 
"only his ult" 
"wow he's so broken" 
"So much cc this is bs"

Lol what... 
Doesn't like Shen only have a 1.5 seconds taunt?

I wonder what he would say about morgana or fiddle (probably nothing as he just ragequit)

Or how about Naut...

*shudders* So... much... CC... in his kit...

>"So much cc this is bs"

o_O
can confirm with recent teammate....
I'm a Darius Player. Can confirm.

you're a liar.
I've played leb and kat since they're release and I'm a total jackass.

Don't let us fool you.
We will flash into the enemy team and use znhoyas because Kappa.

> [{quoted}](name=Blackwolf454,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MfAnzsY4,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2015-04-11T00:10:40.022+0000)
>
> Would you like some fries with that Salt?

Yes please, I was having the time of my life reking that Riven until the DC {{item:3070}} {{champion:59}}{{item:3070}}

J4 Top is legit though
better than being reported for doing that and then winning

"winning"?

I didn't realize it was a reportable offense to win. XD

> [{quoted}](name=Ariel the Cruel,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MfAnzsY4,comment-id=000100030000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-11T02:56:43.578+0000)
>
> "winning"?
> 
> I didn't realize it was a reportable offense to win. XD

Everything is reportable,nothing is permitted.
J4 anywhere is legit.
If they're not BoxBox, yes.
The last Riven I saw went afk 10 minutes into the game. In URF.

**Usually** a good way to see if this is foul play and not your ISP is to open up a browser while the dc or ping spike is happening in game and open up any webpage to see how fast (or slow) it loads. DDos attempts **usually ** focus just on your client's communication with the server at any point, and not on any other aspect on your internet. 

P.S. I put "usually" in bold for the sake of the off chance I'm wrong about some details. I'm merely speaking from personal experience of such events and haven't noticed and/or experienced a full on internet shutdown.

> [{quoted}](name=Sìel,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MfAnzsY4,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-04-10T22:42:20.314+0000)
>
> **Usually** a good way to see if this is foul play and not your ISP is to open up a browser while the dc or ping spike is happening in game and open up any webpage to see how fast (or slow) it loads. DDos attempts **usually ** focus just on your client's communication with the server at any point, and not on any other aspect on your internet. 
> 
> P.S. I put "usually" in bold for the sake of the off chance I'm wrong about some details. I'm merely speaking from personal experience of such events and haven't noticed and/or experienced a full on internet shutdown.

Everything else worked just fine hence how I made this post while DC'd/crashed
